channel.title: FAQ's (Read Before Asking A Question, Contains Most Answers)
channel.description:
[i]This is the Frequently Asked Questions & Answers thread. This thread will help you with questions that are frequently ran into. Please read this over before you post your question. This list will be updated whenever a new error that is obvious to fix occurs.
[b]Creds: Mrquarter and Zirakac[/b]
[b]Q1:[/b] [i]What is a private server?[/i] [b]A1:[/b] [i]A private server is a remake of the Massive Multiplayer Online Role Playing game. You can edit the game and make it to your likeing. You can edit the NPC's, the XP Rate, and anything you would like.[/i]
[b]Q2:[/b] [i]How come MoparScape Client doesn't work?[/i] [b]A2:[/b] [i]You need to download Java and install it. If you have it then re install your client or re download the installer. If that still doesn't work then go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip then extract it to C:\.mpr_file_store_32 then try running it again.[/i] [b]Creds: Zirakac[/b]
[b]Q3:[/b] [i]What is JDK?[/i] [b]A3:[/b] [i]JDK is a compiler well it allows you to compile your server. Without it a hand made client may not work. So if you get in to RS2 Private Servers make sure you download it. you can get it from www.sun.com[/i] [b]Creds: Zirakac[/b]
[b]Q4:[/b] [i]7) Is my ip 127.0.0.1?[/i] [b]A4:[/b] [i] NO IT AINT THAT Seems like everytime some one posts this you either get a respond like for example: Hello join our server now its 24/7 our ip is 127.0.0.1 REPLY 1: Noob Reply 2: LOL!!!! Reply 3: WOW ITS A GOOD SERVER LOL :P
127.0.0.1 is not your ip well not your internet ip you will need hamachi or no-ip[/i] [b]Creds: Zirakac[/b]
[b]Q5:[/b] [i]Is RuneScape Private Server Considered illegal? [b]A5:[/b] [i]No, It is not considered Illegal, Since we have started to make our private servers from scratch like they did. All we did was use their Cache [Which has textures objects etc] And because we did not use the name [RUNESCAPE] over again :) and we would give credits if jagex wanted but i still think its legal other wise cops wuda been at your house[i] [b]Creds: Zirakac[/b]
[b]Q6:[/b] [i]Is their a good way advertising my server?[/i] [b]A6:[/b] [i]Yes their is just copy this and paste it in your new thread in Advertisement section.[/i] [code][b][size=20] YOURSERVERNAME SCAPE[/size][/b] ===Hamachi Data===== //Add the hamachi part if your server runs wiht hamachi Ham Networks: [network name here 1]-[network name here ???] Ham Ip: 5.XX.XX.XX [replace XX with your Ham ip numbers] Port: default or 5555 [usually its 43594 but 5555 on pk servers] [Screenshots under then details after each one]
=========NO IP========= IP: [your no ip here] port: [your port here usually its 43594 but 5555 on pk servers] and [screen shots and after each one a bit of detail to describe each one] and some kind of motto or something :P [/code] [b]Creds: Zirakac[/b]
[b]Q7:[/b] [i]Can I edit people's stats?[/i] [b]A7:[/b] [i]No you cannot. You cannot go into the character files and just edit them there. That will not work. You have to make a level up command. You can find this in the Tutorial Section. But with a level up command, it will bring your xp to a certain amount resulting in leveling you up.[/i]
[b]Q8:[/b] [i]When I try to log into MoparScape, it says I am already logged in.[/i] [b]A8:[/b] [i]This means that the server you are trying to connect to suddenly logged you off. It still thinks that you are on. Either restart the client and try again to log in. Or ask the owner to restart the server which should log your guy off.[/i]
[b]Q9:[/b] [i]When I try to log into MoparScape, it says "Error connecting to server, hit cancel and start server"? [b]A9:[/b] [i]This simply means that the server that you are trying to connect to is down. Try going to the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php]Server Status List[/url] and getting a different server ip. So don't worry. Just keep trying and you will get on one of them eventually.[/i]
[b]Q10:[/b] [i]Can I edit HybridScape?[/i] [b]A10:[/b] [i]No you cannot edit HybridScape because it is built into MoparScape. There is no compile.bat or client.java. HybridScape is for playing alone by yourself. No you cannot edit it. To get an server that you can edit, download any server from the Download's Section.[/i]
[b]Q11:[/b] [i]How come I can't Eat food?[/i] [b]A11:[/b] [i]THEIR STUFFED [lol] Or their not equipped with a weapon You can only eat if your equipped with weapon or certain piece of armor... Or it may be lag.[/i] [b]Creds: Zirak[/b]
[i]Now these are some errors that you may run into frequently.[/i]
[b]Error1:[/b] [code]The path is not specified.[/code] [b]Answer:[/b] [i]This means that you have to set the paths. First download java at www.java.com[/i] [i]Then open up My Computer. [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m169/Sn4ke48/javac1.jpg[/img] [i]Click System Information[/i] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m169/Sn4ke48/javac2.jpg[/img] [i]Click the Advanced Tab[/i] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m169/Sn4ke48/javac3.jpg[/img] [i]Click Enviromental Variables[/i] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m169/Sn4ke48/javac4.jpg[/img] [i]Click New at the top[/i] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m169/Sn4ke48/javac5.jpg[/img] [i]Then for variable Name put [b]CLASSPATH[/b] [i]and for the path put [b]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.[/b] [i]Now click Ok and click New one more time put as the variable name[/i] [b]Path[/b] [i]and the path put[/i] [b]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin[/b]
[i]Now you should be able to runserver and compile.[/i]
[b]Error 2:[/b] [code]'javac' is not recognised as a internal or external command[/code] [b]Answer:[/b] [i]This means that you have not installed java. You have to go to www.java.com and at the top, click Download Now. Then you wil be able to run your server and compile it.
[b]Error 3:[/b] [code]error: unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use[/code] [b]Answer:[/b] [i]This means that you have another program running on that port. Close all programs using port 43595. Either that or make a .bat file and put this in it:[/i] [code]tskill java /a[/code] [i]Run that and it will close anything running on port 43594.[/i] [b]Creds: Itachi Uchiha for Idea[/b]
[b]Enjoy the FAQ's[/b]

item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkk ultimatepkk
item.description:
@ultimatepkk wrote:

valid can u help me!! its nnot running i only see that .bat screen i have this editted in LOOK

@echo off
set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0
set jac=\bin\javac.exe
set jav=\bin\java.exe
cls
:menu
title The Perfect Compiler version 1.5
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - c your server.
echo r - To r your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==c goto c
if %c%==C goto c
if %c%==r goto r
if %c%==R goto r
if %c%==e goto e
if %c%==E goto e
if %c%==* goto er
goto er
:c
cls
title Compiler
goto cjc
:c2
if exist src (goto c5) else (goto c3)
:c3
if exist *.java (goto c4) else (goto ce)
:c4
%javac% -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto menu
:c5
%javac% -cp . .\src*.java
pause
move .\src*.class .\classes
cls
goto menu
:ce
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this cr to c.
pause
cls
goto menu
:r
cls
title Runserver
goto cj
:r2
set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto r3
:r3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto r6) else (goto r4)
:r4
if exist .\server.class (goto r5) else (goto se)
:r5
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:r6
set rjava=
set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:se
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:er
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:e
cls
exit
:cjc
if exist “%pro%_06%jac%” (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2)
:cjc2
if exist “%pro%_07%jac%” (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3)
:cjc3
if exist “%pro%_08%jac%” (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4)
:cjc4
if exist “%pro%_09%jac%” (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5)
:cjc5
if exist “%pro%_10%jac%” (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6)
:cjc6
if exist “%pro2%%jac%” (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7)
:cjc7
if exist “%pro%%jac%” (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8)
:cjc8
if exist “%pro%_01%jac%” (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9)
:cjc9
if exist “%pro%_02%jac%” (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10)
:cjc10
if exist “%pro%_03%jac%” (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11)
:cjc11
if exist “%pro%_04%jac%” (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12)
:cjc12
if exist “%pro%_05%jac%” (goto sjc12) else (goto je)
:sjc
set javac="%pro%_06%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc2
set javac="%pro%_07%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc3
set javac="%pro%_08%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc4
set javac="%pro%_09%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc5
set javac="%pro%_10%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc6
set javac="%pro2%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc7
set javac="%pro%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc8
set javac="%pro%_01%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc9
set javac="%pro%_02%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc10
set javac="%pro%_03%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc11
set javac="%pro%_04%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc12
set javac="%pro%_05%jac%"
goto c2
:cj
if exist “%pro%_06%jav%” (goto sj) else (goto cj2)
:cj2
if exist “%pro%_07%jav%” (goto sj2) else (goto cj3)
:cj3
if exist “%pro%_08%jav%” (goto sj3) else (goto cj4)
:cj4
if exist “%pro%_09%jav%” (goto sj4) else (goto cj5)
:cj5
if exist “%pro%_10%jav%” (goto sj5) else (goto cj6)
:cj6
if exist “%pro2%%jav%” (goto sj6) else (goto cj7)
:cj7
if exist “%pro%%jav%” (goto sj7) else (goto cj8)
:cj8
if exist “%pro%_01%jav%” (goto sj8) else (goto cj9)
:cj9
if exist “%pro%_02%jav%” (goto sj9) else (goto cj10)
:cj10
if exist “%pro%_03%jav%” (goto sj10) else (goto cj11)
:cj11
if exist “%pro%_04%jav%” (goto sj11) else (goto cj12)
:cj12
if exist “%pro%_05%jav%” (goto sj12) else (goto je)
:sj
set java="%pro%_06%jav%"
goto r2
:sj2
set java="%pro%_07%jav%"
goto r2
:sj3
set java="%pro%_08%jav%"
goto r2
:sj4
set java="%pro%_09%jav%"
goto r2
:sj5
set java="%pro%_10%jav%"
goto r2
:sj6
set java="%pro2%%jav%"
goto r2
:sj7

goto r2
:sj8
set java="%pro%_01%jav%"
goto r2
:sj9
set java="%pro%_02%jav%"
goto r2
:sj10
set java="%pro%_03%jav%"
goto r2
:sj11
set java="%pro%_04%jav%"
goto r2
:sj12
set java="%pro%_05%jav%"
goto r2
:je
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download
echo the newest JDK Update.
pause
cls
goto menu

still when i compile i get same error help help!! plz iu wanna put up my scape :’(

there is no any java screen except that .bat screen my jdk version is 1.6.0

-HELP !!!
